title: Onions with Vinegar (Bassal bel Khal)
instructions: Peel the onions and discard the skins then cut them in half.  Place the cut side down on the cutting board and slice them into half-moon shapes.  Sprinkle the onions with a little salt and place them in a ceramic bowl.  Add the vinegar and mint and toss the onions to mix the ingredients well.
Cover the onions with plastic wrap and place the bowl in the refrigerator.  Leave the onions marinating in the refrigerator for at least one hour before serving.
Remarks:  The onions will soften and lose most of their pungency while absorbing the mint flavoring while marinating.
